summary:
Sjakal Vampires is a collection of vampire appearance altering mods
by various authors, aiming to make Dawnguard vampire faces resemble
more closely the person\'s face before becoming a vampire, including
vanilla Skyrim non-glowing red eyes, cleaner facial textures, less
shrunken heads, and also visible fangs.
descriptionHtml:
Sjakal Vampires mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To use Sjakal Vampires you need the following game content installed:

- The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim version 1.8.151.0.7 or later
- The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim Dawnguard DLC

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23205]Vampirism Inverter Dawnguard[/url], to make stage 1 vampires powerful and
later stage vampires less powerful and weaker to fire and sunlight.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mod Description
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sjakal Vampires is a collection of vampire appearance altering mods
by various authors, aiming to make Dawnguard vampire faces resemble
more closely the person\'s face before becoming a vampire, including
vanilla Skyrim non-glowing red eyes, cleaner facial textures, less
shrunken heads, and also fangs for female vampires, as apparently
only male vampires have fangs in the Dawnguard DLC, or so I read.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If installing the mod for the first time it is recommended that you
do so before your character becomes a vampire. Installation after
your character contracts Sanguinare Vampiris may be safe, but doing
it after 72 ingame hours have passed and you reach stage 1 vampirism
may cause unexpected behaviour and corrupt your savegame later on in
the game. Examine the individual mods for more information on this.
And before installing, please ensure you uninstall earlier versions
of Sjakal Vampires, or any of the mods that Sjakal Vampires uses,
via Nexus Mod Manager. These mods are:

- Dawnguard Vampire Eyes Fix
- Vampire Face Less Sunken Cheeks
- Female Vampires Have Fangs
- Dawnguard - Vampire Face Fix

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstallation
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Since Sjakal Vampires contains a long list of data files instead of
single .bsa mod files, the easiest way to uninstall the mod is via
Nexus Mod Manager. Otherwise, please open the compressed mod archive
and locate each individual data file therein and delete that same
file in your Skyrim data folder. This process is tedious, so once
again I recommend using Nexus Mod Manager to install/uninstall mods
in general.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Incompatibilities
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mods modifying the same data files as Sjakal Vampires will conflict,
where the most recently installed mod will overwrite some or all
data files from the prior mod. To avoid conflicts, you should ideally
avoid using any vampire appearance or face altering mods together
with Sjakal Vampires.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known issues/bugs
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sjakal Vampires will have the same known issues and bugs as the mods
it contains. Once new versions of these mods are available, I can
create a new version of Sjakal Vampires to include these new fixes.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version History
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v01 on 15 December 2012:
- Skyrim Nexus initial release

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All credit goes to the original creators of the mods Skyrim Vampires
is based on. These mods and their creators are:

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21669]Dawnguard Vampire Eyes Fix[/url] by Renegadeof79
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16506]Vampire Face Less Sunken Cheeks[/url] by Devacore
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22522]Female Vampires Have Fangs[/url] by Acdale
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21656]Dawnguard - Vampire Face Fix[/url] by CraftyGremlin
author: Sjakal
